resources.string: Welcome to the Recipe Search Page
Click on a recipe in the list to view the details. You can save a recipe by pressing favourite and you can go to the recipes website by clicking on the URL.
Click on a recipe in the list to view the details. You can also go to the recipes website by clicking [Go to website] or delete a recipe by selecting [delete]."

To use this interface enter a recipe name in the first search bar and add your ingredients (separated by commas) in the second search bar. When you have all the information filled, then press the search button!" Press Favourites to check out your saved recipes.
